metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 7 - Management’s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations/
aws::graph::propositions: Factors Affecting Amazon's Effective Tax Rates
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by changes in business operations.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by acquisitions.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by investments.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by entry into new businesses.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by entry into new geographies.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by intercompany transactions.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by the relative amount of Amazon's foreign earnings.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by earnings being lower than anticipated in jurisdictions where Amazon has lower statutory rates.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by earnings being higher than anticipated in jurisdictions where Amazon has higher statutory rates.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by losses incurred in jurisdictions for which Amazon is not able to realize related tax benefits.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by the applicability of special tax regimes.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by changes in foreign exchange rates.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by changes in Amazon's stock price.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by changes to Amazon's forecasts of income and loss.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by the mix of jurisdictions to which Amazon's income and loss relate.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by changes in Amazon's deferred tax assets and liabilities.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by changes in the valuation of Amazon's deferred tax assets and liabilities.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by changes in tax laws.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by changes in tax regulations.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by changes in administrative practices related to tax.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by changes in principles related to tax.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by changes in interpretations related to tax.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by changes to the global tax framework.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by competition laws in various jurisdictions.
Amazon's effective tax rates could be affected by accounting rules in various jurisdictions.

metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 7 - Management’s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations/
/FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 7 - Management’s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations/

text: Our effective tax rates could be affected by numerous factors, such as changes in our business operations, acquisitions, investments, entry into new businesses and geographies, intercompany transactions, the relative amount of our foreign earnings, including earnings being lower than anticipated in jurisdictions where we have lower statutory rates and higher than anticipated in jurisdictions where we have higher statutory rates, losses incurred in jurisdictions for which we are not able to realize related tax benefits, the applicability of special tax regimes, changes in foreign exchange rates, changes in our stock price, changes to our forecasts of income and loss and the mix of jurisdictions to which they relate, changes in our deferred tax assets and liabilities and their valuation, changes in the laws, regulations, administrative practices, principles, and interpretations related to tax, including changes to the global tax framework, competition, and other laws and accounting rules in various jurisdictions.
